attributes.action: A Fairer Megabit Per Second Download Speed Price for Broadband Users
attributes.additional_details:
This e-petition is to get MP’s to pass a bill to force internet providers to provide a fairer and more equal Megabit Per Second Download Speed Price for broadband users that are not able to be offered Superfast Broadband and are being penalised by ISP’s by being charge a much higher rate per megabit per second download speed for much inferior product.
Please go to http://www.facebook.com/fairerMPSDSpricecampaign for more info.
